You are missing a lot if you didn't play this masterpiece of a franchise.
Really good and entertaining story and ending.
Also one of the best coop experiences, just buy it.

Well, I've played for 3,299 hours and writing this is the only way to stop Steam from constantly asking me if I'd recommend this game. I think the hours speak for themselves. The Community/workshop maps are an awesome supply of fun and relaxation.
